rule.description: Mutha kuyika izi podina kumanja patsamba lililonse lawebusayiti, ulalo wa tsambali udzawonjezedwa mwachisawawa .

url.title: Ulalo wa URL, ulalo wathunthu.
url.explain: Njira iyi ingafanane ndi ulalo wathunthu.

glob.title: Njira yapadziko lonse lapansi imagwiritsa ntchito laibulale ya {{1}} Chonde onani kuti mugwiritse ntchito, kapena mutha kusaka kugwiritsa ntchito {{2}}.

example.a: {{1}}, yomwe ikufanana ndi tsamba lofikira la YouTube ndi masamba onse ang'onoang'ono.

regexp.title: Kufotokozera pafupipafupi, chonde onani Onani kuti mugwiritse ntchito.
